metadataAttributes.Title: Understanding TikTok and Its Users
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This is the first course in the Marketing with TikTok specialization. In this course, you will learn what TikTok is, who uses TikTok, and how people use this fun and unique platform. You will discover how to set up a personal account and learn all the best strategies for creating content.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Social Media Marketing,Content Creation,Content Marketing,Social Media Platforms,
